Package app.models

Class RequestContinuation

java.lang.Object
app.models.Request
app.models.RequestContinuation
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI, Serializable
public class RequestContinuation extends Request implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI
Extends the Request class to include handling of execution state, facilitating tracking and management of request processing within a sensor network. This class is used to represent a continuation of a request where the state of the execution needs to be maintained and accessible.

    • RequestContinuation

      public RequestContinuation(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.ExecutionStateI es, String uri)
      Constructs a RequestContinuation with the specified query code, client connection info, and execution state.
      Parameters:
      queryCode - The QueryI code that specifies the operation to be performed.
      clientConnectionInfo - The ConnectionInfoI providing details about the client's connection.
      es - The ExecutionStateI object that tracks the current state of the request's execution.

    • RequestContinuation

      public RequestContinuation(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI request, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.ExecutionStateI es, String uri)
      Constructs a RequestContinuation based on another continuation request.
      Parameters:
      request - The original continuation request to be derived.
      es - The execution state associated with the continuation of the request.
      uri - The URI of the continuation request.

    • isLeaf

      public boolean isLeaf()
      Checks if the request is currently at a leaf node in the network.
      Returns:
      True if the request is at a leaf node, false otherwise.
